page.title: 08LOCAL SWIMMING POOLS
page.content: My mum,Lynne, works at the Dolphin Leisure Centre.The Dolphin has a new swimming pool(with a wave machine),a sauna,an aerobics centre and a restaurant.It is in central Romford near the market.My mum is a cashier receptionist and she gives information about the centre.She wears a uniform,which is a navy blue skirt,a white blouse and a navy blue blazer that has a picture of a Dolphin and the word'Dolphin'printed on it.She works different hours at the centre,anytime from 8.3Oa.m. to 1Op.m. Swimming is a popular hobby with children of the area.Many visit local pools once or twice a week.Another new pool is in Dagenham at Becontree Heath.Pupils from Robert Clack Comprehensive School have their swimming lessons here.
